visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the monthly rainfall data for a year. Additionally, specify custom colors for the series and configure the chart with a background color and margins.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a background color of light gray (#f9f9f9) with a bottom margin of 80 pixels. The x-axis displays the months of the year with labels styled in a dark gray color and a font size of 12px. The y-axis is titled 'Rainfall (mm)' with labels aligned to the left, also styled in dark gray with a font size of 12px. The data series represents the monthly rainfall data with a custom color of blue (#0073e6). The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 12px.
